UN Prevention of Torture Convention Fails Vote

United Nations General Assembly Resolution 39/46, The Convention against Torture and Other Cruel, Inhuman or Degrading Treatment or Punishment, has been defeated by vote in the United Nations General Assembly.

Prevention of Torture Convention UN Vote

We have the opportunity to vote on United Nations General Assembly Resolution 39/46, The Convention against Torture and Other Cruel, Inhuman or Degrading Treatment or Punishment, at the UN General Assembly.\nWe can either vote For it, Abstain, or vote Against it.
